content: nana ruth s memory blanket pattern notes a beginner friendly rectangle worked from the middle with marvelous texture for a solid- colored blanket named in honor of my nana who s beautiful and intricate crochet designs inspired my love of the craft abbreviations & special stitches chain chain double_crochet double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet dcsdg - single_crochet 2dc in same stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch blsc- single_crochet in the back loop only bldc double_crochet in the back loop only chain 31 all stitches in are to be worked in the same stitch round 1 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook ch2 *2dc next chain this completes the first corner double_crochet next 24 chain these are the side stitches ** 2 double_crochet next chain chain 2 2 double_crochet corner notes except for the last chain chain 2 and begin working from * to **along bottom of chain 2dc next chain beginning corner all corners for chain 2 slip_stitch to top of first chain 3 to join double_crochet rounds are worked as 2dc ch2 2dc for dcsdg rounds round 2 turn and slip_stitch into chain 2 space in the ch2 space ch3 double_crochet *double_crochet each corners are single_crochet 2dc chain 2 2dc stitch to corner * 2dc ch2 2dc in corner chain 2 space repeat from* to last stitch before final corner in final corner 2dc ch2 slip_stitch to top of first chain 3 to join i highly recommend placing a stitch marker in the first ch3 of round 3 turn and slip_stitch into ch2 space ch3 double_crochet in ch2 space *skip next 2 stitches every round dcsdg next stitch repeat from * to 3rd stitch from corner skip next 2 st single_crochet 2dc chain 2 2dc in corner chain 2 space ** repeat from * to ** to last corner single_crochet 2dc gauge in dcsdg pattern 6 row ch2 in last corner ch2 space slip_stitch to top of chain to join x 5 pattern stitch = 4x4 square rounds 4 8 repeat round 3 the pictured blanket was made with 2 skeins of caron one rounds 9-12 repeat round 2 pound in fig with a size 6mm continue repeating rounds 4-12 until you reach desired size ending with round 8 hook and measures approximately 60x45 to increase or decrease the length add or subtract from the beginning chain in multiples of 3 © 2021 witherun style optional border do not turn between round begin in corner round 1 chain 1 single_crochet every stitch working 3 single_crochet in corners slip_stitch to working 2dc ch2 2dc in corners slip_stitch to the top of the first ch3 to join round 4 blsc every stitch working 3 single_crochet in corners slip_stitch to the top of first single_crochet to join
